meanings.definition: Capable of igniting spontaneously in air.
meanings.sent1: The pyrophoric metal burst into flames as soon as it touched the air.
meanings.sent2: The lab warned us to handle the pyrophoric chemicals with extreme caution.
meanings.sent3: The pyrophoric powder seemed to have a mind of its own, lighting up unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her temper was like a pyrophoric reaction, erupting suddenly and fiercely.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was as pyrophoric as a dragon breathing fire.
